rationale: Phase 1 results demonstrate clear TikTok platform superiority with 43% lower CPA ($21-23 vs $37). The winning combination (TikTok + Interest + UGC) achieved $21.09 CPA with 127 conversions, providing statistical confidence (p < 0.05) in its performance. Meta's failure with Lookalike audience suggests the issue is platform-specific, not audience-specific. By reallocating Meta budget to scale the TikTok winner, we expect to reduce blended CPA from $25.8 to $22-23 while maintaining total conversion volume. Meta remains in the mix with 21% budget using TikTok's winning targeting/creative to test if format is the differentiator.

expected_improvement.confidence_level: High (90%+) based on 127-conversion sample from combo_1
